title: Multiplayer
content: Multiplayer in Baldur's Gate 3 allows players to join others for cooperative-only play, be it over the internet or via LAN. Baldur's Gate 3 Early Access supports 4-player online multiplayer, but split-screen will not be immediately available on launch.
